pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ vassikasāṭikā anuññātā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū appamāṇikāyo vassikasāṭikāyo dhāressantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.8: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, appamāṇikāyo vassikasāṭikāyo dhārethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.11: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, appamāṇikāyo vassikasāṭikāyo dhāressatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.12: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1.15: Tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ—dīghaso cha vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyā; tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.4: karonto vā kārāpento vā. Pamāṇikā kāretabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.5: Tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ— dīghaso cha vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyā; tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.6: Taṃ atikkāmetvā karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.8: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.9: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.10: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.11: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.12: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.1.13: Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
